Bernard Manyandure (1929–1999) bụ onye Zimbabwe na-akpụ ihe.
A mụrụ Manyandure na Nyanga, ma nweta ọtụtụ n'ime isiokwu ya site na akụkọ ọdịnala obodo
O so na ndị mbụ na-akpụ ihe na Frank McEwen's Workshop School, na-anọnyere ya site na ntọala ya na 1957 ruo 1973
Na mbụ ọ bụ onye ọrụ ugbo na-azụ ahịa, o mechara ghọọ onye na-akpụ ihe ọkpụkpụ oge niile
E gosipụtara ọrụ ya na nnukwu ihe ngosi mbụ nke ihe ọkpụkpụ Zimbabwe na Paris na London, ma gosipụtakwa ya na Museum of Modern Art na New York City.
